<h3>Functional relationships for <script type="math/tex">\;X \sim Poisson(\lambda),\;\;\lambda \in [0,\infty), x=0,1,...;</script>
</h3>
$$
\begin{aligned}
f(X=x|\lambda)&=\frac{e^{-\lambda}\lambda^{x}}{x!}\\\\
F(X=x|\lambda)&=\sum_{i=0}^{x}\left(\frac{e^{-\lambda}\lambda^{i}}{i!}\right)\\\\
h(x)&=\frac{\lambda{e}^{-\lambda{t}}}{e^{-\lambda{t}}}=\lambda\\\\\
E[X]&=\lambda\\\\
Var[T]&=\lambda
\end{aligned}
$$
